item.title: Help im having a client.java problem?
item.dc:creator: @Killerswan Killerswan
item.description:
@Killerswan wrote:

Hello im having a bit of a problem with my client.java its a 1 error problem which i cant seem to find out how to fix maybe its extremely easy and im over looking it. or i just dont see it. so if someone could plz explain to me whats going on would be nice. Heres the error and the code.

The error is this:
Client.java:34035: class, interface, or enum expected
}
^
1 error detected!

thats all that it is giving me. thats it. thats all. so yea thats why im confused. it didn't explain anything.

The code goes like this:
  }
if(useItemID == 1059 && atObjectID == 4123) // Search cart
{
addItem(998, 1000000);
addItem(392, 150);
addItem(5553, 1);
addItem(5554, 1);
addItem(5555, 1);
addItem(5556, 1);
addItem(5557, 1);
deleteItem(1059,getItemSlot(1059), 1);
sendMessage("You put on the gloves and search the cart but your gloves are torn to pieces.");

	       }
            }
	}
     }

Help is much appreciated, If you need more info i can supply it. or what i can anyway. thank you.

~Killerswan

Read full topic
item.source: Help im having a client.java problem?
